name: Eagle Mountain Retreat
description:
Eagle Mountain Retreat - Nestled in the mountains and secluded in the trees is this enchanting Big Bear family cabin. Eagle Mountain Retreat is the perfect place for two families, featuring three bedrooms, one full bathroom and two half baths. This beautiful cabin has been recently renovated from top to bottom with a rustic modern motif, which includes a brand-new kitchen, bathrooms, appliances, and top of the line décor! Kids suite on the lower level is equipped with a beautiful reclaimed barn wood full/full bunk bed, a pullout twin trundle, a TV and gaming station accompanied by one of the half baths. Full bath and living spaces are located on the main level. The cabin is equipped with a wood burning fireplace in the living room, FREE WiFi, Apple TV with Direct TV Now Streaming Cable, Netflix, and Amazon. Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Eagle Mountain Retreat has a full kitchen with beautiful stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, gas stove/oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, blender, toaster, Keurig and traditional coffee maker, dishes, and pots/pans. Large deck off the front and side of the house has patio furniture and gas barbecue for relaxing or outdoor dining with beautiful mountain and sunset views! You will truly be relaxed after spending time at the Eagle Mountain Retreat.

Master Bedroom - king bed, half bath, mountain views, upstairs.

Bedroom Two - queen bed, mountain views, upstairs.

Bedroom Three - full/full bunk beds, half bath, downstairs.

Eagle Mountain Retreat comes with fresh towels, and beds are made up with fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has the cabin clean and ready before your visit and does the cleaning after your stay.

Parking for 3 vehicles.

No indoor smoking is permitted.

Sorry, but Eagle Mountain Retreat does not allow pets.

Check in after 4 pm.

Check out before Noon.

name: Casa De Oso Lakefront
description:
Casa De Oso Lakefront - You won’t want to go home once you step into this lavish log cabin, lakefront property, nestled just minutes from the Big Bear Lake Village. This picture perfect home is enveloped in warm lighting and comfort. Granite counter tops and surfaces, along with high vaulted cedar ceiling create a style as timeless as the lake view. This four bedroom and three and one half bath gorgeous vacation home comes complete with a large great room, wood burning fireplaces, cinema room with surround sound, FREE WiFi, cable TVs, DVD players, pool table, ping pong table, and washer/dryer. Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Casa De Oso features a huge gourmet kitchen including granite countertops and large bar, stainless steel appliances including stove/oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, blender, toaster, coffee maker, dishes, pots/pans, and much more. Indoor Hot tub! Back yard with deck and propane barbecue.

Master Bedroom - king bed, fireplace, private bath, private deck with indoor spa.

Bedroom Two - king bed, TV, DVD player.

Bedroom Three - queen bed, TV.

Bedroom Four - two sets of bunk beds (twin/twin and twin/double), TV, DVD player.

Our Lakefront homes usually require a 3 night stay during the summer months. For reservations less than 3 nights, please call to inquire. $500 security deposit charged at final payment.

Casa De Oso comes with fresh towels, and beds are made up with fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has the home clean and ready before your visit and does the cleaning after your stay.

name: The Big Bear Arms
description:
The Big Bear Arms - Large groups of family and friends looking for a mountain escape with all the comforts of home will be able to get away from it all and relax in this home perched in Big Bear City’s Upper Moonridge neighborhood just a short drive from Bear Mountain Resort and the shores of Big Bear Lake. Boasting 2,300 square feet of comfort, this grand home is spacious and open with peaked, beamed ceilings and a versatile layout. This pet-friendly home includes FREE WiFi, cable TVs with movie channels, an in-home converted garage game room (with pool, ping pong and XBox 360) and washer/dryer. The well-equipped kitchen includes an island and granite counters, a gas stove and dishwasher, and it opens onto the dining room and living room with wood-burning fireplace, cable TV and DVD/Blu-ray player with DVD library. The fully fenced backyard has a charcoal grill and a private hot tub. With three walls of windows, a ceiling fan and a private wood-burning fireplace, the master bedroom exudes comfort. There's even a private balcony perfect for sunsets. The configuration of this rental makes it a versatile property that can comfortably house large families, multiple families traveling together, big groups of friends, or anything in between. It’s a perfect setup for that holiday gathering with loved ones or for your yearly ski trip or lake retreat with friends.

name: Alpine Lakefront
description:
Alpine Lakefront - Rustic and woodsy older home and furnishings but right on the lake with great amenities. Vintage Lakefront with hot tub! Three bedrooms plus loft, two and one-half bathroom, pool table, card table, large brick wood burning fireplace, cable TVs including sports and kids channels, FREE WiFi, 3 DVD players with a movie library of over 70 titles, iPod/iPhone dock. Fitted with all the conveniences of home Alpine Lakefront has a full kitchen with breakfast bar, stove/oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, blender, toaster, coffee maker, dishes, pots/pans and more. Huge fenced yard with giant sequoias and eagle nesting trees. Private balconies with gorgeous views. Hot tub on the wraparound deck with a barbecue with lake and mountain views. The pool table has been recovered, the deck has been re-stained and the house has been repainted. Fish from the shore or just listen to the gentle lake waves. name: Vale Vacation
description:
Vale Vacation - Located on the eastern edge of the National Forest in the Big Bear Valley, this cozy three bedroom, two bath retreat has forest/slope views, wood burning fireplace, TV, DVD player, FREE WiFi and washer/dryer. Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Vale Vacation has a full kitchen with stove/oven, refrigerator, microwave, blender, toaster, coffee maker, dishes, pots/pans, and more. Fenced yard. Upper deck with gas barbecue. Close to dirt bike and 4 wheel drive trails. A short hike to God's Eye will reward you with a breathtaking view of the Lucerne Valley. Considered sacred by the Serrano Indians, the Eye of God was formerly a magnificent quartz dome, which was believed to actually be god's eye, the lens He used for monitoring the daily activities of the Indians in the Valley!

name: Snowy Evening Lodge
description:
Snowy Evening lodge - Beautiful custom built cabin home in upper Moonridge! This modern log cabin is comfortable and cozy with amenities and thoughtful. From the stone wall gas fireplace to the beautiful pine wood accents and the vaulted ceilings in the living area and master suite, this is a cabin to experience. FREE WiFi throughout and a full laundry ensure you have the comforts of home even while you are enjoying the National Forest! Enjoy the private back deck with awesome views of the surrounding forest which is bursting with birds and other wildlife. Relax with a quiet day at the cabin. Peruse our library of books and movies where you are sure to find something to amuse and entertain you or settle in for a family game night. Our collection of games and puzzles has something for everyone, so help yourself! HDTV in the living area has cable, DVD player and is connected to the FREE WiFi, so you can access Netflix, Hulu, Amazon prime etc. for even more options.

Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Snowy Evening Lodge has a great open kitchen complete with all of the appliances and tools to cook and bake anything you might want to prepare. Or take it outside and enjoy the views while you grill and enjoy your feast out on the balcony. Fast and efficient forced air heating in all rooms keeps this cabin warm and inviting in winter and the central air (a very rare feature in Big Bear!) keeps you comfortable even on those warm summer and fall nights. This home has been awarded the 2017 Certificate of Excellence by Tripadvisor.

Living room is large with a leather sectional couch and a raised hearth, brick fireplace perfect for making smores on cold winter nights. For your entertainment is an LCD TV, Roku with Netflix, FREE WiFi, and Surround Sound Home Entertainment Center with Smart Phone capable BlueTooth connectivity to play your favorite music, DVD player, DVD collection. There is seating for six at the table in the kitchen. Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Alpine Haus has a full kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stove/oven, refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, toaster oven, pots/pans including a turkey pan and cookie sheets, dishes, glasses, silverware, and more. Walking distance to Bear Mountain Ski Resort, hiking trails, Moonridge Zoo and the Golf Course. Just a short drive away on Big Bear Boulevard are restaurants and grocery stores.

Bedroom One - queen bed, twin bed, TV, upstairs.

Bedroom Two - queen bed, twin bed, upstairs.

Alpine Haus comes with fresh towels, and beds are made up with fresh linens and plenty of cozy blankets. Our dedicated cleaning crew has the cabin clean and ready before your visit and does the cleaning after your stay.

name: Moonridge Retreat
description:
Moonridge Retreat - A sense of seclusion and privacy await you at this upper Moonridge cabin. Located near the end of a cul-de-sac on a short street with no traffic, this rustic retreat is minutes from Bear Mountain, Big Bear Golf Course, National Park land trails, and Moonridge Zoo. Big Bear Lake, Snow Summit and Big Bear Village with shops and restaurants are only a short distance away. You will really feel like you have escaped from the hustle and bustle of life “down the hill” while enjoying mountain and forest views at this two level, dog friendly cabin offering, two bedrooms, two bathrooms, 2 fireplaces, FREE WiFi, large flat screen TV with DVD players in both living areas, flat screen TV in upper bedroom, Roku on all TVs with FREE HBO NOW. Fitted with all the conveniences of home, Moonridge Retreat has a full kitchen with stove/oven, refrigerator, microwave, blender, toaster, coffee maker, dishes, pots/pans. Deck has brand new hot tub, propane barbecue and a charcoal barbecue, two large decks to relax and enjoy the forest.
